House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04702
FULL TITLE : AN ACT INCREASING THE PENALTY FOR VIOLATION OF THE PROVISIONS OF REPUBLIC ACT 8484
SHORT TITLE : " Access Devises Regulation Act Of 1998 " Amendment
ABSTRACT : Seeks to amend Sec.10 of R.A.8484 otherwise known as the "Access Devises Regulation Act of 1998", making it a non-bailable offense. Increases the fines for this offense anywhere from P3,000,000 to P5,000,000, instead of the present P10,000.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ATIENZA, JOSE JR. L.
DATE FILED : 2016-12-21
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON REVISION OF LAWS ON 2017-01-16
